page.title: 02PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: Greenstead Green has two pulic houses where refreshments and meals can be purchased during licensing hours. The Hare and Hounds has a garden area open to the public and provides a facility of swings and slides for small children, as well as seating and tables for adults so they may enjoy their drinks and meals whilst keeping a watch over their children. This makes it an enjoyable family occasion. There is a garden nursery in Greenstead Green which is very well known for its magnificent display of fuscias. From early spring the public are invited to wander at their leisure and see and purchase some of these beautiful plants.
